  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client(ClientView clientView)
      Initializes socket and input, output streams to communicate with the server. Executors.newSingleThreadExecutor() sets the thread for receiving message from server.

  • Method Details

    • receiveMessage

      public void receiveMessage()
      Receive message from the server. Create a thread for receiving and manage the message. By creating a thread for each message, we can receive multiple message at the same time. Based on the message class type, it calls the right method in the Client View using the Visitor Pattern. For each message, the visit method is called on a separated thread so when a Disconnection Message arrives, every thread which is using a visit method will be closed, so the disconnection message will be displayed. By this way, the disconnection message has a higher priority over other messages. Consequently, it's fundamental to initialize the visitTaskQueue in order to execute the visit method, associated to the Disconnection Message, using Executors.

    • update

      public void update(Message message)
      This method is executed when the notify method is called on ClientView. If it's an UpdateServeInfoMessage, it's a notification reserve to the Client class in order to instantiate the Socket. Otherwise, it's a message to send to Server.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<Message>
      Parameters:
      message - to send from client to server.

    • instantiateSocket

      private void instantiateSocket(UpdatedServerInfoMessage message)
      Tries to instantiate a socket between the client and the server. If a server is listening on the IP address written by the user, it instantiates the socket, I/O streams and the executors that manage the receipt of messages. After that, it calls a view method that asks the player to insert the username.
      Parameters:
      message - the message that contains the IP address of server the user wants to connect.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(Message message)
      Parameters:
      message - to send from client to server.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnects the client socket from the server.
